snippet.title: Haunted House - MAGNAVOX ODYSSEY (1972)
snippet.description:
odySim v0.1e simulator

Card 4  Magnavox Odyssey
number of players  2 players (versus)
Designer: Ralph Baer.

Haunted House requires Odyssey's game card #4 and is the first horror/ mystery game.
 
"The detective gropes in the dark, gathering all the clues possible, as he works his way to the treasure on the top floor of the haunted house. Fun for all ages.

grab the simulator here:
http://odysim.blogspot.mx/
